languages.text: However powerful a Rogue Trader you are, to deal with vendors of the Koronus Expanse, you will have to demonstrate your authority and gain renown with them.
languages.original_text: Каким бы могущественным Вольным Торговцем вы ни были, для ведения дел с торговцами Простора Коронус вам придется зарабатывать добрую репутацию в отношениях с ними.

traits.locale_text: However powerful a Rogue Trader you are, to deal with vendors of Koronus Expanse, you will have to demonstrate your authority and gain renown with them.
However powerful a Rogue Trader you are, to deal with vendors of the Koronus Expanse, you will have to demonstrate your authority and gain renown with them.
However powerful a Rogue Trader you are, to deal with vendors of the Koronus Expanse, you will have to demonstrate your authority and gain renown with them.

languages.text: Каким бы могущественным Вольным Торговцем вы ни были, для ведения дел с торговцами Простора Коронус вам придется зарабатывать добрую репутацию в отношениях с ними.

Por impresionante que sea tu posición como Comerciante Independiente, tendrás que demostrar tu autoridad y ganarte el reconocimiento de los vendedores de la Extensión de Koronus para tratar con ellos.
languages.original_text: However powerful a Rogue Trader you are, to deal with vendors of the Koronus Expanse, you will have to demonstrate your authority and gain renown with them.

traits.locale_text: Por impresionante que sea tu posición como Comerciante Independiente, tendrás que demostrar tu autoridad y ganarte el reconocimiento de los vendedores de la Extensión de Koronus para tratar con ellos.

languages.text: 无论您是多么强大的行商浪人，若想与科罗努斯扩区的各个供应商打交道，您都需要展示您的权威，在他们那里积累声誉。
languages.original_text: However powerful a Rogue Trader you are, to deal with vendors of the Koronus Expanse, you will have to demonstrate your authority and gain renown with them.

traits.locale_text: 无论您是多么强大的行商浪人，若想与科罗努斯扩区的各个供应商打交道，您都需要展示您的权威，在他们那里积累声誉。

languages.text: いくら強大な自由開拓者であっても、コロヌス・エクスパンスの商人と取引するには、自分の権威を示し、彼らからの評価を得る必要があるのだ。
languages.original_text: However powerful a Rogue Trader you are, to deal with vendors of the Koronus Expanse, you will have to demonstrate your authority and gain renown with them.

traits.locale_text: いくら強大な自由開拓者であっても、コロヌス・エクスパンスの商人と取引するには、自分の権威を示し、彼らからの評価を得る必要があるのだ。

languages.text: Egal, wie mächtig du auch sein magst, um mit den Händlern der Koronus-Ausdehnung zu handeln, musst du deine Autorität unter Beweis stellen und dir bei ihnen Ansehen verschaffen.
languages.original_text: However powerful a Rogue Trader you are, to deal with vendors of the Koronus Expanse, you will have to demonstrate your authority and gain renown with them.

traits.locale_text: Wie mächtig du als Freihändler auch sein magst, um mit den Händlern der Koronus-Ausdehnung zu handeln, musst du deine Autorität unter Beweis stellen und dir bei ihnen Ansehen verschaffen.

languages.text: Quelle que soit votre puissance en tant que libre-marchand, pour traiter avec les vendeurs des Étendues de Koronus, vous devrez asseoir votre autorité et gagner en renommée auprès d'eux.
languages.original_text: However powerful a Rogue Trader you are, to deal with vendors of the Koronus Expanse, you will have to demonstrate your authority and gain renown with them.

traits.locale_text: Quelle que soit votre puissance en tant que Libre-Marchand, pour traiter avec les vendeurs des Étendues de Koronus, vous devrez asseoir votre autorité et gagner en renommée auprès d'eux.

languages.text: Ne kadar kudretli bir Hür Tacir olursan ol, Koronus Enginliği'nin tüccarlarıyla iş yapabilmen için otoriteni göstermen ve onların gözünde ün kazanman gerekir.
languages.original_text: However powerful a Rogue Trader you are, to deal with vendors of the Koronus Expanse, you will have to demonstrate your authority and gain renown with them.
